mapper.select:
select id ,
from t_tag where !ISNULL(description) and ISNULL(description_ch)

select id ,
from t_tag where !ISNULL(description) and ISNULL(description_ch) order by id DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into t_tag
id,
name,
create_time,
update_time,
create_user_id,
description,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_tag
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
description_ch = #{descriptionCh,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_tag set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
